pages.text: The $(major)XP Attraction Field/$ Gene causes players to $(minor)grab XP Orbs from a much larger distance/$.$(br2)This Gene is disabled when the player has an active $(major)Anti Field Orb/$, or when sneaking.$(br2)This Gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs/$.
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Endermite
